title: OPRF finance advisers rejectusing debt to fund projects - Wednesday Journal
content: OPRF finance advisers rejectusing debt to fund projects  Wednesday Journal
description: Members of District 200’s Community Finance Advisory Committee turned down the possibility of incurring debt to fund countless capital maintenance projects spanning the next decade at Oak Park and River Forest High School. Committee members met Feb. 3 via Zoom and discussed debt-based financing options that the school board and district administration have mulled over […]
